description:
Want FREE gift cards just for shopping? Obviously. Use shopkick to get points for walking into stores like Target, Macy’s, Best Buy, and more. We’ll also show you the best products and deals nearby. Then, redeem your points for gift cards. The hardest part? Deciding on your free reward.

Still not convinced?
Shopkick users have already earned more than $25 million in gift cards for Target, Starbucks, iPads, and more. Join over 7 million users who are getting rewarded for their everyday shopping.

We’re kind of famous.
“This app is addictive.” – Oprah.com
“The number 1 most frequently used shopping app.” – Nielsen 
“One of the best apps for holiday shopping.” – Huffington Post
“Best Shopping App.” – About.com Reader’s Choice Award
trackCensoredName: shopkick: Deals and Free Gift Cards For Shopping at Your Favorite Stores
trackName: shopkick: Deals and Free Gift Cards For Shopping at Your Favorite Stores
releaseNotes:
Keep an eye out for new features rolling out over the next few weeks:

• Now each store has its own page with all the STORE DETAILS. You'll be able to get to kicks & deals faster while shopping.
• We made it easier to keep track of your kicks with the KICKS CENTER. Tap the kicks counter and see your progress toward your next reward. 
• Additional bug fixes and improvements.
